web_snippets: Mike Cosper is a writer and podcaster. He's the Director of Podcasting for Christianity Today, where he hosts The Rise and Fall of Mars Hill and Cultivated.
Mike Cosper is the director of CT Media and the producer of Christianity Today's podcast The Rise and Fall of Mars Hill. He's the author of several books.
Mike Cosper is a writer and podcast producer/senior director of podcasts at Christianity Today. In 2021 he produced and hosted The Rise and Fall of Mars Hill.
